Products.Name: InfinityRN 4
Products.Description: With supportive cushioning built for a smooth run, the InfinityRN 4 helps you hit the ground running. Made with soft, comfortable Nike ReactX foam and updated with Nike Running's best-fitting Flyknit yet, this road runner helps you take off anytime, anywhere. It’s the kind of shoe that can grant you that priceless peace of mind to go faster and farther, thanks to high foam stacks and an intuitive design that supports every stride.

Products.Name: Wildhorse 8
Products.Description: Hoof it from the trailhead to the top, and handle winding paths, rolling hills and everything in between in the Nike Wildhorse 8. With an abundance of rugged traction, cushioned responsiveness and trusted containment to help keep you upright, it’s made for tough trail runs, the ones with limitless miles and gnarly terrain that are too enticing to turn down. This special design is part of our ongoing #IYKYK series. It traverses the Pyrenees mountains via the GR 11, using the coastal lighthouses as your guide from the Mediterranean Sea to the Cantabrian Sea.

Products.Name: G.T. Cut 3
Products.Description: How can you separate your game when it’s winning time? Start by lacing up in the G.T. Cut 3. Designed to help you create space for stepback jumpers and backdoor cuts, its sticky multicourt traction helps you stop on a dime and shift gears at will. And when you're making all those game-changing plays, the newly added, ultra-responsive ZoomX foam helps keep you fresh for four quarters.

Products.Name: Supernova Rise
Products.Description: We've designed the Supernova Rise to deliver maximum comfort in every stride. Our Dreamstrike+ technology cushions the midsole with re-engineered super foam. What makes it so super, you ask? It offers the ideal balance of comfort and support to keep you comfy mile after mile. Additionally, you will get a system of denser foam Support Rods which means in the real world worry-free transition from heel to toe. Finally, our Comfort Heel Fit combines cushy foam and soft textile for a more secure fit so that it feels like the shoe is giving your heel a hug.

Products.Name: D.O.N Issue 5
Products.Description: From the moment he first stepped onto the hardwood, Donovan Mitchell has been a game changer, and that's continued even as his game has grown and evolved. These D.O.N. Issue 5 signature shoes from adidas Basketball continue to build on Spida's on-court persona as well as his off-court social activism. Riding an ultra-lightweight Lightstrike midsole and a unique rubber outsole with an elevated traction pattern, these basketball trainers help you dominate the game just like one of the sport's very best.

Products.Name: Velocity Nitro 3
Products.Description: The PUMA Velocity NITRO™ 3 – with this shoe, we're taking industry-best and bringing it to you. These kicks are all about speed and comfort thanks to advanced NITRO™ technology, offering superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package. Get ready to up your running game with the Velocity NITRO™ 3. It's not just a shoe; it's a statement.

Products.Name: Electrify NITRO 3
Products.Description: The perfect choice for young runners, the Electrify NITRO™ 3 running shoe offers a progressive design, delivering cushioning and reliability for your daily jog; with more NITRO™ in the heel and durable PROFOAMLITE throughout the midsole for better responsiveness and ride, a revamped breathable mesh upper with a futuristic look, and a retooled rolled collar and heel that hugs your foot.

Products.Name: Stewie 3 Dawn in ‘Cuse
Products.Description: Breanna Stewart has won everything there is to win in the world of Women’s basketball. Her signature line represents not only the records she has achieved and the championships she has won, but also her own story. The 3rd Season is all about how everything Stewie has done and accomplished started as an idea, a seed, and has grown from her being known not only locally but globally. The shoe represents her story of how she has played all over the world and, along the way, has planted roots and seeds for those who are to come after her.

Products.Name: Lite 3
Products.Description: No one says your sneakers can't look just as good post-run as they do while you're getting your miles in. Case in point, these men's running shoes from Reebok. The lightweight outsole gives you premium cushioning as you hit the pavement, and the comfort levels stay high when you hit the town for lunch with friends afterwards.

Products.Name: Sky Elite FF MT 3
Products.Description: The SKY ELITE™ FF MT 3 indoor shoe helps you experience powerful jumps, allowing your game and mind to reach new heights. To create faster acceleration for higher jumps, this shoe uses RISETRUSS™ technology for a powerful lift-off. The midsole is updated with FF BLAST™ PLUS ECO cushioning for advanced cushioning and a more energized bounce when jumping. Lastly, the upper construction is designed with more support to create a locked-down feel, improved fit, and increased force efficiency.

Products.Name: Gel-Game 9
Products.Description: Both durable and comfortable, the GEL-GAME™ 9 tennis shoe is versatile for the recreational athlete who plays several times per week. Preserving its excellent support properties, our focus this season was to improve the shoe's ventilation and flexibility. Featuring an open mesh design on the upper to improve airflow and keep feet cool, this shoe is complemented with synthetic leather overlays and a PU (polyurethane) film that offers improved stability during abrupt transitions. The TRUSSTIC® technology in the midsole generates better stability on the court, while the new tooling combines an EVA midsole foam with GEL® technology cushioning in the forefoot to increase shock absorption. Additionally, the improved outsole offers better flexibility and a more durable design.

Products.Name: Court FF 3 Novak
Products.Description: The COURT FF™ 3 tennis shoe is modeled after Novak Djokovic’s playing style. These shoes are designed to help you swing stronger and recover quicker between shots. ​Novak has a zero-step shot. This means that he’s swinging his racquet when he lands. By increasing the outsole’s contact area, the shoe creates a stable landing and reduces the load placed on the body. As a result, you’re able to put more energy into generating a powerful swing. ​For a smoother crossover step, this shoe allows you to perform quicker turns in a shorter timeframe. With good outsole grip and a TWISTRUSS™ support system, you can push off the ground with more force. This helps you quickly recover and get back to your ready position more smoothly.

Products.Name: Fresh Foam X More v4
Products.Description: The most Fresh Foam used in any shoe to date, the latest in the line utilizes more Fresh Foam X, stacks it higher than ever before, and distributes it across the length of the shoe, offering a plush, yet stable underfoot experience. A data driven outsole applies the strategic placement of dramatic cushion zones and drastic flex zones promoting a natural stride while the silhouette’s rocker profile promotes a smooth transition and ride. All of this sits beneath an engineered mesh upper that keeps you locked with breathable comfort and support.

Products.Name: Daniil Medvedev AG-LT23 Ultra
Products.Description: The Lacoste tennis experience, tested and approved by Daniil Medvedev. The AG-LT23 Ultra surpasses the AG-LT21 in all areas, including improved support, response, and grip on all surfaces. Pro-level performance is within your grasp.

Products.Name: VECTIV Fastpack FUTURELIGHT
Products.Description: The Men’s VECTIV™ Fastpack FUTURELIGHT™ Shoes are lightweight hikers for fast-paced, single-day missions. These breathable, water-resistant trail shoes have cushioned, rockered midsoles that deliver comfort while maximizing energy return.

Products.Name: Line
Products.Description: The GIANT Line Men's Cycling Shoe is engineered for performance and comfort, catering to the needs of avid cyclists and enthusiasts alike. Crafted with precision and utilizing high-quality materials, these shoes offer optimal power transfer and efficiency while pedaling. Designed with the unique demands of cycling in mind, they feature a stiff yet lightweight construction that enhances pedaling dynamics and minimizes energy loss. The GIANT Line Men's Cycling Shoe also prioritizes comfort with its ergonomic design, providing ample support and stability during long rides. Whether tackling challenging trails or cruising through urban streets, these shoes offer a seamless blend of performance and comfort, making them an essential choice for cyclists seeking top-tier footwear.

Products.Name: Fresh Foam X Hierro v8
Products.Description: People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there’s more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. Uneven terrain, debris, and moisture are unique challenges to footwear that require specialized construction. For those who take going off the beaten path literally, there’s the Fresh Foam X Hierro, a dedicated, off-road application of our best running technology. The Fresh Foam X Hierro v8 employs a Vibram® Outsole to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning and a breathable, lightweight upper.

Products.Name: Morphlite
Products.Description: Running comfort and traction come together in a lightweight athletic package with the new Morphlite road-to-trail running shoe. Made for trails with rare obstacles with light to no debris. Little directional change with hard surface terrain changes likely.

Products.Name: Caldera 7
Products.Description: Delivering long-haul comfort for lengthy trail runs, the Caldera 7 men's trail-running shoe combines premium cushioning with a durable, dynamic feel for a stable ride on varied terrain.

Products.Name: COHESION KDZ
Products.Description: From track to tag, this sneaker is made for action. They'll be light on their feet with the mix of leather and mesh materials, and ready for take-off with the extra grippy sole. Bonus: anti-stink lining helps reduce odors!

Products.Name: Lite Pro
Products.Description: Stay comfy from school days to weekend playground fun with the easy-wearing Skechers Skech-Lite Pro. This lightweight stretch-laced design features a mesh and synthetic upper, Skechers Adaptive Closure, and a cushioned comfort insole.

Products.Name: X ULTRA 360 GTX
Products.Description: Inspired by the best-selling X ULTRA Family, this hiking shoe is the go-to option for outdoor enthusiasts. The X ULTRA 360 GORE-TEX is packed with all the technology you need, including all terrain contagrip and Gore-Tex® waterproof protection. This shoe can take the heat on climbs, descents or pretty much any adventure you set out on.

Products.Name: Chamonix 3
Products.Description: Introducing the all-new Chamonix 3 helmet—the perfect choice for an all-road, everyday helmet. Featuring design elements pulled from our S-Works helmets, in addition to high-performance comfort and ventilation, the Chamonix is the perfect choice for your road, gravel, or commuting adventures. We designed the Chamonix helmet specifically for riders who live a bike-first lifestyle—looking for fun on every ride. Featuring Mips technology, a removable visor, and a sleek design all while earning the highest 5-Star Virginia Tech® Helmet Rating, you’ll both look and feel good on the bike. The Chamonix delivers premier comfort, performance-driven ventilation, and S-Works inspired design language, all in an accessible package.

Products.Name: 2-IN-1
Products.Description: These regular 2 in 1 shorts are a versatile design, made to complement your athletic collection and complete your routine. Designed with a compression under short for a comfortable and effortless fit. This pair works for any workout, so why not elevate with Everlast this season.

Products.Name: MX
Products.Description: Handcrafted in Mexico the Everlast MX Pro Fight Gloves are the go-to glove for professional fighters across the world. Combining premium Mexican leather and custom horsehair, these are Everlast's best gloves to date. The premium Mexican leather maximizes flexibility and wrist comfort. The custom horsehair and foam blend allows for optimal power transfer. Carefully handcrafted in Mexico for superior quality.

Products.Name: SUPER BOWL LVIII
Products.Description: Step into the dazzling world of Las Vegas with our Super Bowl LVIII Printed PU Football – a celebration of the thrilling energy and vibrant spirit of the entertainment capital of the world! This limited-edition football is more than just a piece of sports memorabilia; it's a tribute to the excitement and glamour that define both Las Vegas and the Super Bowl.

Products.Name: BLADE 98 V9
Products.Description: Building on nearly 20 years of dominance, Wilson's Blade performance rackets continue to be the preferred choice of avid competitors looking for ultimate control, feel and stability. The Blade 98 (18x20) V9 has a sharper, more stable response that produces a more connected-to-the-ball feel. Featuring a new Emerald Night matte finish, the v9 has a braided graphite + basalt frame with a DirectConnect carbon fiber handle for enhanced torsional stability. StableFeel technology enhances the racket's sharp response and the feel of its control-oriented string pattern.

Products.Name: NANOFLARE NEXTAGE
Products.Description: A resilient yet surprisingly flexible graphite material providing increased power.ISOMETRICTM technology continues to help the world’s greatest players achieve global success. Developed over 30 years ago, the ISOMETRICTM design increases the sweet spot by 7%*. Compared to a conventional round frame, a square-shaped ISOMETRICTM racquet generates a larger sweet spot by optimizing the intersection of the main and cross strings.

Products.Name: PRO
Products.Description: The Yonex PRO Bag is a sleek and practical accessory designed for the modern athlete. Its easy-to-use design ensures quick access to gear, while robust storage options offer ample space for essentials. Crafted in the signature Yonex blue color, this bag not only exudes style but also boasts durability, making it suitable for athletes of all levels. With comfortable carrying features and a stylish design, the Yonex PRO Bag is the perfect companion for those who prioritize convenience and performance on and off the court.

Products.Name: HYPERLITE 2
Products.Description: The HYPERLITE 2 HELMET is the most advanced helmet we’ve ever built. Engineered for the elite and pro-inspired player who doesn’t want to compromise on comfort, protection, or performance, the HYPERLITE 2 HELMET offers an optimum level of performance in a state-of-the-art package

Products.Name: HYPERLITE 2
Products.Description: The HYPERLITE 2 HELMET is the most advanced helmet we’ve ever built. Engineered for the elite and pro-inspired player who doesn’t want to compromise on comfort, protection, or performance, the HYPERLITE 2 HELMET offers an optimum level of performance in a state-of-the-art package

Products.Name: HYPERLITE 2
Products.Description: The HYPERLITE 2 HELMET is the most advanced helmet we’ve ever built. Engineered for the elite and pro-inspired player who doesn’t want to compromise on comfort, protection, or performance, the HYPERLITE 2 HELMET offers an optimum level of performance in a state-of-the-art package

Products.Name: HYPERLITE 2
Products.Description: The HYPERLITE 2 HELMET is the most advanced helmet we’ve ever built. Engineered for the elite and pro-inspired player who doesn’t want to compromise on comfort, protection, or performance, the HYPERLITE 2 HELMET offers an optimum level of performance in a state-of-the-art package

Products.Name: PROTO-R GRIP
Products.Description: Add deception to your game and become every goalie’s worst nightmare with the BAUER PROTO-R Stick. Combining the #1 NHL BAUER stick construction with BORON Fiber Technology (exclusive to BAUER), the PROTO-R is unlike any other stick on the ice. BORON’s lightweight properties and one-of-a-kind compression, paired with a mid-kick construction to optimize shot power from anywhere on the ice, makes the PROTO-R BAUER’s most deceptive stick in the game.

Products.Name: PROTO-R GRIP
Products.Description: Add deception to your game and become every goalie’s worst nightmare with the BAUER PROTO-R Stick. Combining the #1 NHL BAUER stick construction with BORON Fiber Technology (exclusive to BAUER), the PROTO-R is unlike any other stick on the ice. BORON’s lightweight properties and one-of-a-kind compression, paired with a mid-kick construction to optimize shot power from anywhere on the ice, makes the PROTO-R BAUER’s most deceptive stick in the game.

Products.Name: Squadra B II
Products.Description: The Squadra junior's tee features moisture-wicking DEEP DRY technology to keep you dry no matter how long you're on court.

Products.Name: Squadra B II
Products.Description: The Squadra junior's tee features moisture-wicking DEEP DRY technology to keep you dry no matter how long you're on court.

Products.Name: Squadra B II
Products.Description: The Squadra junior's tee features moisture-wicking DEEP DRY technology to keep you dry no matter how long you're on court.

Products.Name: Stadio 200 III FG
Products.Description: The Lotto shoes feature a premium upper design combining K-leather, goat leather, and PU leather for a custom fit and enhanced comfort. The TPU outsole ensures exceptional durability, while the conical fixed polyurethane studs provide superior stability and traction for multidirectional movements. The 4+4 studs formation allows these shoes to perform well even on harder or sandy grounds, making them versatile for various playing conditions. Imported and crafted with quality, these Lotto shoes offer a blend of durability, comfort, and performance.

Products.Name: MAESTRO 700
Products.Description: Lotto Maestro, the shoe designed for players who want to reinvent the game, dictate the pace and rewrite the rules with their brilliant skills. Designed for perfect ball control with its enveloping sensation and total comfort, Maestro embraces the foot and contains it.The asymmetrical cut of the lacing increases the ball control area and allows you to dominate the game! The different types of sole offered make the shoe perfect for any surface and playing condition! FG - FIRM GROUND OUTSOLE Outsole with 12 studs guaranteeing maximum traction, stability and multidirectional movements on firm grounds.

Products.Name: Lite 24
Products.Description: The Women’s Trail Lite 24 is a technical daypack full of features designed to optimize its women-specific fit, maximize access to your gear and distribute weight comfortably—because the challenge in your day hike shouldn’t come from your pack.

Products.Name: ULTRA-DRY ANTI-UV PIQUÉ
Products.Description: A polo designed just for golf by Lacoste, creators of the polo in 1933, and tried and tested by our players. The fluid, lightweight piqué fabric is made from Emana® fibers for comfort, with stretch for freedom of movement. The mineral components of the fiber help regulate temperature as you play.

Products.Name: ULTRA-DRY ANTI-UV PIQUÉ
Products.Description: A polo designed just for golf by Lacoste, creators of the polo in 1933, and tried and tested by our players. The fluid, lightweight piqué fabric is made from Emana® fibers for comfort, with stretch for freedom of movement. The mineral components of the fiber help regulate temperature as you play.

Products.Name: SKY ELITE FF MT 3
Products.Description: The SKY ELITE™ FF MT 3 indoor shoe helps you experience powerful jumps, allowing your game and mind to reach new heights.​To create faster acceleration to set up for higher jumps, this shoe uses a RISETRUSS™ technology unit for a powerful lift-off.​We also updated the midsole with FF BLAST™ PLUS ECO cushioning to help create advanced cushioning and a more energized bounce when jumping.​Lastly, the upper construction is designed with more support to help create a locked down feel, an improved fit, and increased force efficiency.

Products.Name: Highlight 2 RM
Products.Description: The Highlight provides powerful support to help you play with unstoppable speed. Even though it's super-high cut, it's still incredibly light and breathable, so you can stay explosive every snap.

Products.Name: Highlight 2 RM
Products.Description: The Highlight provides powerful support to help you play with unstoppable speed. Even though it's super-high cut, it's still incredibly light and breathable, so you can stay explosive every snap.

Products.Name: Highlight 2 RM
Products.Description: The Highlight provides powerful support to help you play with unstoppable speed. Even though it's super-high cut, it's still incredibly light and breathable, so you can stay explosive every snap.

Products.Name: Highlight 2 RM
Products.Description: The Highlight provides powerful support to help you play with unstoppable speed. Even though it's super-high cut, it's still incredibly light and breathable, so you can stay explosive every snap.

Products.Name: Halftime
Products.Description: Never be without ALL your stuff. This backpack protects your laptop, holds a full change of clothes, and keeps all your other electronics dry. And still has tons more space.

Products.Name: 24/25 Home
Products.Description: 0161 is more than an area code. You'll see it written on lampposts, printed on t-shirts, and tattooed on people. It's an accent, a swagger, a sense of what being Mancunian is all about – even if you aren't Mancunian. This season, we thread 0161 through the trims of the 24/25 Home Kit and invite the world to wear it. From East Manchester to Istanbul, Northern Quarter to Norway, Moss Side to the other side of the world. If it's Sky Blue, it's 0161. That's Manchester Calling.

Products.Name: 24/25 Home
Products.Description: Hit the pitch like Manchester City's finest in these football shorts. They're made from sweat-wicking material to keep you cool in the tensest moments of the game and are finished with the team's famous crest on the leg.

Products.Name: Locker
Products.Description: The Nike Locker Iridescent Swim Bag is made with clear material so you to find your items easily. The perforations help items ventilate and drain after swimming. It has a 3-liter capacity to hold your swimming gear before and after practice.

Products.Name: ESSENTIALS SOLID
Products.Description: The beach is the OG amusement park, which is why it always lifts your spirits. Soak up the sun and play in the surf in these adidas swim shorts. Lightweight fabric repels water and dries quickly. The classic design is finished with a Trefoil logo on one leg.Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Products.Name: ESSENTIALS SOLID
Products.Description: The beach is the OG amusement park, which is why it always lifts your spirits. Soak up the sun and play in the surf in these adidas swim shorts. Lightweight fabric repels water and dries quickly. The classic design is finished with a Trefoil logo on one leg.Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Products.Name: ESSENTIALS SOLID
Products.Description: The beach is the OG amusement park, which is why it always lifts your spirits. Soak up the sun and play in the surf in these adidas swim shorts. Lightweight fabric repels water and dries quickly. The classic design is finished with a Trefoil logo on one leg.Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Products.Name: ESSENTIALS SOLID
Products.Description: The beach is the OG amusement park, which is why it always lifts your spirits. Soak up the sun and play in the surf in these adidas swim shorts. Lightweight fabric repels water and dries quickly. The classic design is finished with a Trefoil logo on one leg.Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Products.Name: COLORBLOCK STRIPE
Products.Description: Rugby style adds a fresh feel to this golf polo. AEROREADY manages sweat to keep you cool and dry for full-round comfort you can count on any day. By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 70% total of these materials.

Products.Name: COLORBLOCK STRIPE
Products.Description: Rugby style adds a fresh feel to this golf polo. AEROREADY manages sweat to keep you cool and dry for full-round comfort you can count on any day. By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 70% total of these materials.

Products.Name: PRE-MATCH
Products.Description: Real Madrid don't just play with style, they warm up in style too. Taking inspiration from the city of Madrid, a bold 'R' & 'M' is executed in an oversized, houndstooth pattern, delivering a larger-than-life, color-blocked design. With a wearable fit and a bespoke graphic, this top is a head-turning way to show off your winning mentality and passion for the club. Striking colors keep a clean link to the away jersey and soft, moisture-wicking AEROREADY fabric helps you stay focused whether you find yourself gearing up for an international match — or your local 5-a-side.

Products.Name: 23/24 FOURTH AUTHENTIC
Products.Description: A fusion of elegance and tradition, this limited-collection adidas Real Madrid authentic jersey continues the club's collaboration with Y-3. A bold floral design, heat-applied Y-3 logo and Yohji Yamamoto signature take the spotlight. In the background, HEAT.RDY works hard to keep players cool during big match moments.This product is made with 100% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

Products.Name: 23/24 HOME
Products.Description: Tradition gets a golden touch in the Real Madrid 23/24 Home Jersey. Keeping a crisp all-white base, the striking kit continues the thread of powerful design, delivering a sleek jersey steeped in legendary football history.With a nod to older kits, gold details are re-introduced and emphasized by elegant navy framing. An allover print is a subtle update to the classic white color, complemented by a 'designed-for-fans' approach that keeps the fit and feel ready for stylish everyday wear. Sweat-wicking AEROREADY helps you feel comfortable on the field or in the crowd — while the embroidered crest and '¡Hala Madrid!' on the neck brings the club's winning mentality to life.

Products.Name: TIRO 24
Products.Description: Light up the pitch in these lightweight Tiro 24 soccer shorts from adidas. Designed to handle games of the highest intensity, they include moisture-wicking AEROREADY to keep you feeling fresh until the final whistle. Those 3-Stripes on the sides and that embroidered 3 Bar Logo add a finish worthy of your play.

Products.Name: 2023/24 Match Third
Products.Description: Using natural tones, 100% recycled polyester and a new pattern designed to help reduce material waste, the FC Barcelona 2023/24 3rd jersey was created with sustainability in mind. Our Match collection pairs authentic design details with lightweight, quick-drying technology to help keep the world’s biggest soccer stars cool and comfortable on the field.

Products.Name: 2023/24 Match Home
Products.Description: The FC Barcelona 2023/24 Home kit honors the 30-year journey of the Women’s squad being incorporated into the club. The crest has a hidden diamond shape that was historically used by the Women's team, and the classic stripes have a diamond pattern along the edges. Our Match collection pairs authentic design details with lightweight, quick-drying technology to help keep the world’s biggest soccer stars cool and comfortable on the field.

Products.Name: 2022/23 Stadium Home
Products.Description: Like other shorts from our Stadium collection, these ones pair replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favorite team. This product is made with 100% recycled polyester fibers.
